channel.title: Jar client
channel.description:
Could someone give me an idea why the battlescape client wont jar properly... it does everything within the jarmaker stages fine but when you come to trying to open it the dam thing doesnt load ... i have jarred clients lots of times before without a problem so i am clearly missing something ...
Thanks

item.title: Jar client
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“1 2 3 4 KOED, post:1, topic:535327”]Could someone give me an idea why the battlescape client wont jar properly… it does everything within the jarmaker stages fine but when you come to trying to open it the dam thing doesnt load … i have jarred clients lots of times before without a problem so i am clearly missing something …

Thanks[/quote]
I suggest completely restarting, re do another certificate and shit, rejar, delete all class files in the client files and recompile, then jar.

Read full topic
